mapper.select:
select a.* from (SELECT rownum rn, b.* from (select j.member_id member_id, j.product_no product_no, p.image image, p.price price, p.product_name product_name from jjim j inner join product p on j.product_no = p.product_no where j.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY product_no) b
where rownum <= (#{page}) * 5 ) a
where a.rn > (#{page} - 1) * 5
